info.title: Invoice Ninja
info.description: Invoice Ninja. Open Source Invoicing lives here.

post.description: Attempts a new account signup and returns a CompanyUser object on success

terms_of_service.description: The user accepted the terms of service

privacy_policy.description: The user accepted the privacy policy

password.description: The user password must meet minimum criteria ~ >6 characters

post.summary: Attempts to reset the users password

items.example: Reset link send to your email.
Unable to send password reset link

post.description: Returns a CompanyUser object on success

password.description: The user password must meet minimum criteria ~ >6 characters

get.description:
Lists clients, search and filters allow fine grained lists to be generated.

        Query parameters can be added to performed more fine grained filtering of the clients, these are handled by the ClientFilters class which defines the methods available

post.description: Adds an company to the system

get.description: Displays an company by id

put.description: Handles the updating of an company by id

delete.description: Handles the deletion of an company by id

get.description: Displays an company by id

get.summary: Gets a new blank company object
get.description: Returns a blank object with default values

post.summary: Performs bulk actions on an array of clients

items.description: Array of hashed IDs to be bulk 'actioned

items.description: Array of hashed IDs to be bulk 'actioned

get.summary: Performs a custom action on an invoice
get.description:
Performs a custom action on an invoice.
        
        The current range of actions are as follows
        - clone_to_invoice
        - clone_to_quote
        - history
        - delivery_note
        - mark_paid
        - download
        - archive
        - delete
        - email

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: The action string to be performed

company_logo.description: The URL to the company Logo

shared_invoice_quote_counter.description: Flags whether to share the counter for invoices and quotes

invoice_number_prefix.description: This string is prepended to the invoice number

invoice_number_pattern.description: Allows customisation of the invoice number pattern

quote_number_prefix.description: This string is prepended to the quote number

quote_number_pattern.description: Allows customisation of the quote number pattern

client_number_prefix.description: This string is prepended to the client number

client_number_pattern.description: Allows customisation of the client number pattern

credit_number_prefix.description: This string is prepended to the credit number

credit_number_pattern.description: Allows customisation of the credit number pattern

recurring_invoice_number_prefix.description: This string is prepended to the recurring invoice number

payment_terms.description: -1 sets no payment term, 0 sets payment due immediately, positive integers indicates payment terms in days

reset_counter_frequency_id.description: CONSTANT which is used to apply the frequency which the counters are reset

counter_padding.description: Pads the counter with leading zeros

reset_counter_date.description: The explicit date which is used to reset counters

is_owner.description: Determines whether the user owns this company

is_locked.description: Determines whether the users access to this company has been locked

updated_at.description: The last time the record was modified

deleted_at.description: Timestamp when the user was archived

X-Api-Secret.name: X-Api-Secret
X-Api-Secret.description: The API secret as defined by the .env variable API_SECRET

X-Requested-With.name: X-Requested-With
X-Requested-With.description: Used to send the XMLHttpRequest header

X-Api-Token.name: X-Api-Token
X-Api-Token.description: The API token to be used for authentication

include.name: include
include.description: Includes child relationships in the response, format is comma separated

index.name: index
index.description: Replaces the default response index from data to a user specific string

X-RateLimit-Remaining.description: The number of requests left for the time window.

X-RateLimit-Limit.description: The total number of requests in a given time window.
